Comparison of poll results: The expert examined multiple national polls to compare the strength of Bernie Sanders and Hillary Clinton against Republican candidates. They looked at polls conducted by NBC News and the Wall Street Journal, Quinnipiac Poll, and Public Policy Polling to analyze the candidates' performance in hypothetical matchups.
Sanders: performance against specific Republican candidates: The expert analyzed the results of the Quinnipiac Poll and Public Policy Polling to assess Sanders' performance against individual Republican candidates. They found that Sanders performed slightly worse than Clinton against Marco Rubio and Ted Cruz, but the differences were within the margin of error.
Clinton: s performance against Republican candidates: The expert also examined the performance of Hillary Clinton against Republican candidates in the Quinnipiac Poll and Public Policy Polling. They found that Clinton generally performed better than Sanders, except in the case of Rubio, where she lost by a single point.
